historique.Le domaine maritime est communément conn: The maritime domain is commonly known to be a vast terrain for the propagation of crime of different natures while it constitutes the key factor in the fluidity of international trade and commerce. Sustainable and responsible exploitation of the maritime domain requires above all the control of maritime safety and security. Given its transversality, its preservation is the responsibility at the national level of different state structures and also of its users. However, a lack of collaboration between the entities concerned in its management and operation has always been noted, thus weakening its full potential.
historique.Le Centre Régional de Fusion d'Informati: The Regional Maritime Information Fusion Center (RMIFC) was founded in 2017 in response to the growing need to strengthen the security and safety of regional waters around Madagascar. The organization was established through close cooperation with several international partners, including the Indian Ocean Commission, the European Union, the US Navy and other regional and global institutions.
historique.Dans cette entreprise, le CRFIM compte p: In this enterprise, the RMIFC counts among its stakeholders and collaborators, the ministerial departments and public and/or private organizations working in the maritime domain sitting within its Board of Directors or third parties whose relationships are officially governed by protocols agreement to exchange and share data.
historique.Nos missions sont vastes et variées : co: Our missions are vast and varied: collection and analysis of data, monitoring of maritime activities, coordination of rescue operations and maritime security, management of marine resources, monitoring of traffic and maritime activities, meteorology, maritime incidents . Hence the establishment of the M.A.S.E (Maritime Security) program
historique.Date de création du centre: Date of creation of the center
historique.Mises en place des infrastructures et de: Establishment of infrastructure and operational capacities
historique.Signatures de l'accord de collaboration: Signatures of the collaboration agreement between partner governments and organizations involved
historique.Lancement officiel des opérations aux CR: Official launch of operations at the RMIFC
historique.Élargissement du mandat du CRFIM pour in: Expanding the mandate of the RMIFC to include training and capacity building of regional actors in the field of maritime security
historique.1. Maintenir la qualité de travail et la: 1. Maintain the quality of work and operational capacity of our employees
historique.2. Multiplier les efforts dans la promot: 2. Increase efforts in promoting maritime safety

faq.Le CRFIM est une organisation régionale: The RMIFC is a regional organization based in Madagascar, specialized in monitoring, analysis and sharing of information crucial for maritime security in the region.
faq.Comment je peux contacter le CRFIM ?: How can I contact the RMIFC?
faq.Bâtiment CFIM, Rez de chaussé, Soanieran: CFIM Building, Ground Floor, Soanierana-Ankaditoho, Antananarivo, Madagascar
faq.Comment puis-je obtenir des informations: How can I get information about current sea conditions in the area?
faq.1. En consultant les bulletins météorolo: 1. By consulting the marine weather bulletins and navigation notices available on our website.
faq.2. En contactant notre centre d'informat: 2. By contacting our maritime information center.
3. By coming directly to see us.

questions.Bonjour. Le CRFIM offre-t-il des formati: Good morning. Does the RMIFC offer maritime safety training?
questions.Oui, le CRFIM propose des programmes de: Yes, RMIFC offers training and capacity building programs for regional actors involved in maritime security, including law enforcement, port authorities and other stakeholders.

partnaire.Le Centre régional de coordination des o: The Regional Coordination of Operations  Center (RCOC) is established by the Agreement on the Coordination of Operations at Sea. It is located in Seychelles and responsible for planning operations at sea, in collaboration with the Regional Information Fusion Center maritime. It hosts a liaison officer from each of the Parties and its governance is governed by the provisions indicated in the annex to the agreement.
partnaire.Intergovernmental Authority on Developme: Intergovernmental Authority on Development (IGAD) is a regional grouping created on March 21, 1986 and bringing together seven East African countries: Djibouti, Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan, South Sudan and Uganda.
partnaire.La Communauté d'Afrique de l'Est ( EAC ): The East African Community (EAC) is an intergovernmental organization composed of eight East African countries. The member states are the Democratic Republic of the Congo, the Federal Republic of Somalia, the republics of Burundi, Kenya, Rwanda, South Sudan, Uganda and Tanzania.
partnaire.Le Marché commun de l'Afrique orientale: The Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) is a regional economic community in Africa composed of twenty-one member states stretching from Tunisia to Eswatini.
partnaire.La Commission de l'Océan Indien ( frança: The Indian Ocean Commission (French: Commission de l'Océan Indie, COI) is an intergovernmental organization that connects the African nations of the Indian Ocean: Comoros, Madagascar, Mauritius, Réunion (an overseas region of France) and the Seychelles.
partnaire.L'Union européenne (UE) est une union po: The European Union (EU) is a sui generis political-economic union of twenty-seven European states which delegate or transmit by treaty the exercise of certain powers to community bodies.

cadres.Le Centre Régional de Fusion d'Informati: The Regional Maritime Information Fusion Center (RIFIC) operates in accordance with international conventions and treaties relating to maritime security, including
cadres.La Convention des Nations Unies sur le d: The United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea (UNCLOS):
cadres.Cette convention établit les droits et l: Cette convention établit les droits et les obligations des États en matière d'utilisation des océans et des ressources marines.
cadres.La Convention internationale pour la séc: The International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea (SOLAS)
cadres.Cette convention établit des normes inte: This convention establishes international standards for ship safety, including safety equipment and operating procedures.
cadres.La Convention internationale pour la pré: The International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships (MARPOL):
cadres.Cette convention vise à prévenir la poll: This convention aims to prevent marine pollution from ships by establishing standards for the control of pollutant discharges.
cadres.Troisième Conférence sur linteropérabili: Third Conference on SHARE-IT System Interoperability, Joint Initiatives with UNODC, Nov 21, 2023, Thailand, Bangkok.
cadres.Le CRFIM travaille en étroite collaborat: The CRFIM works closely with the relevant national authorities and complies with national laws and regulations relating to maritime security and surveillance of territorial waters.
cadres.La Commission de l'océan Indien (COI) et: The Indian Ocean Commission (IOC) and the Government of the Republic of Madagascar signed two headquarters agreements during a ceremony held on February 18 at the Iavoloha State Palace in the presence of the President of the Republic, Hery Rajaonarimampianina .
cadres.Le premier accord de siège, signé avec l: The first headquarters agreement, signed with the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Béatrice Atallah, concerns the installation of a coordination unit for the regional food and nutritional security program which will be led by the IOC over the period 2015-2020.
cadres.« L'URSAN, Unité régionale pour la sécur: « URSAN, Regional Unit for Food and Nutritional Security, as we now call it, will be mandated to implement the various Program facilities. It will be responsible for implementing the intervention measures planned under the various facilities to provide incentives to private and public actors in the value chains,» explained Jean Claude de l'Estrac, Secretary General of the IOC.
cadres.Le second accord, entérine la décision d: The second agreement ratifies the decision of the 30th IOC Council deciding on the establishment of a regional maritime information fusion center (CRFIM) in the Malagasy capital. It was signed with the Minister of Defense, Dominique Rakotozafy.
cadres.La mise en place d'un centre régional de: The establishment of a regional maritime information fusion center « results from the issues linked to the emergence of the Indian Ocean as a geostrategic center of gravity as well as the awareness, by the coastal States, of their vulnerability to the threats posed by piracy, terrorism, different kinds of trafficking and the plundering of their natural resources, » recalled the President of the Republic. And to specify that « the Headquarters Agreement relating to the CRFIM constitutes the culmination of a long process of political and diplomatic negotiations, both on a bilateral and regional scale ».
cadres.Signature des accords entre le Secrétair: Signing of agreements between the Secretary General of the IOC and the Malagasy Ministers of Foreign Affairs and Defense, June 27, 2019, Madagascar, Antananarivo.
cadres.Béatrice Atallah, ministre des Affaires: Béatrice Atallah, Minister of Foreign Affairs of Madagascar; Jean Claude de l'Estrac, Secretary General of the IOC; H.E.M. Hery Rajaonarimampianina, President of the Republic; Domonique Rakotozafy, Minister of Defense, June 27, 2019, Madagascar, Antananarivo.
cadres.Le CRFIM est signataire de protocoles d': RMIFC is a signatory to MOUs and Memoranda of Understanding with other regional and international organizations with the aim of strengthening coordination and collaboration on maritime security, combating piracy and other maritime threats .
cadres.Signature en ligne du Memorandum d'enten: Online signing of the Memorandum of Understanding: Auxillum worldwide, CRCO, and CRFIM join forces, December 19, 2023, Madagascar, Antananarivo.
cadres.1. Accords relatifs à l'Océan Indien Occ: 1. Agreements relating to the Western Indian Ocean
cadres.2. Online Signing of the Memorandum of U: 2. Online signing of the MoU: Auxilium Worldwide, RCOC and RMIFC join forces
cadres.3. Signature d'un protocole d'accord ent: 3. Signing of a memorandum of understanding between RCOC and IFC-IOR

categorie.Les domaines pris en charges par le CRFI: The areas supported by the RMIFC as part of Maritime Domain Awareness
categorie.Illegal unregulated and unreported fishi: Illegal unregulated and unreported fishing by sea
categorie.Illegal Migration and Human trafficking: Illegal Migration and Human trafficking by sea
categorie.Le Centre Régional de Fusion d'Informati: The Regional Information Fusion Center monitors and analyzes maritime incidents to provide an overview of activities in regional waters, facilitating the coordination of incident responses.
categorie.Le centre travaille en collaboration ave: The center works in collaboration with relevant authorities to detect, monitor and prevent arms trafficking and smuggling by sea, thereby contributing to strengthening security and stability in the region.
categorie.Le Centre Régional de Fusion d'Informati: The Regional Information Fusion Center monitors and evaluates the impact of human activities on the maritime environment, thus contributing to the preservation and protection of marine ecosystems.
categorie.Le centre identifie et surveille les inf: The center identifies and monitors critical maritime infrastructure, such as ports and oil installations, to prevent potential threats and ensure their security and continued operation.
categorie.Le centre surveille les cybermenaces cib: Le centre surveille les cybermenaces ciblant les infrastructures maritimes et coordonne les efforts pour protéger les systèmes informatiques critiques contre les attaques et les intrusions.
categorie.Le centre surveille les événements natur: The center monitors natural events such as storms and earthquakes, and provides Humanitarian Assistance in Disasters (HADR) to ensure an effective and coordinated response to emergency situations.
categorie.Cette catégorie englobe divers domaines: This category encompasses various areas of focus that are not specifically covered by the other categories, allowing the center to monitor and respond to a wide range of threats and situations.
categorie.Le centre surveille les activités crimin: The center monitors criminal activities and acts of violence at sea, helping to ensure the safety and security of sea lanes and ships.
categorie.Le centre surveille les activités liées: The center monitors activities related to the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction by sea, in coordination with the International Security Program (ISP) and other international partners.
categorie.Le centre surveille et régule les activi: The center monitors and regulates boating and maritime tourism activities to ensure the safety of travelers and the protection of marine resources in tourist areas.
categorie.Le centre travaille à détecter, surveill: The center works to detect, monitor and prevent illegal, unregulated and unreported fishing at sea, thereby contributing to the preservation of marine resources and the sustainability of fishing industries.
categorie.Le centre surveille les activités de mig: The center monitors illegal migration and human trafficking activities by sea, working with national and international authorities to prevent these criminal activities and protect the rights of migrants.
